details: The Metric Aggregator is a New Relic One Application that helps you create an Event To Metric (E2M) rule. Events-to-metrics is a New Relic real-time streaming service that converts event data into dimensional metrics at ingest. New Relic stores these Metrics for 13+ months so they can be used for long-term trending.
whatsNew:
- Disable or enable E2M rules 

 - Check Metric cardinality as you create your E2M rule 

 - Filter E2M rules
